description:
A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La grande bataille des pièces d`or !
黄金の大勝負[だいしょうぶ]!
